voa_urd_20090131.0013__7
general kapoor said that decisions regarding matters of war and peace are made by the political leadership on matter pertaining to taken decides or makes dealing with related he stated decided gen is responsible deal issues relevant affairs managed in for when was asked comment about pakistans rejection indian proofs mumbai attacks controlled leaders
